name: fnpack
description: ## Event Sources     - [ ] Async         - [x] Expressable in the frontend         - [ ] Use SNS for event propagation         - [ ] Connects to code artifacts         - [ ] Errors via dead letter queue     - [ ] Sync         - [x] Expressable in the frontend         - [ ] Event propagates through code             - [ ] Middleware propagation             - [ ] Pipe propagation         - [ ] Stack trace & Errors     - [ ] FFI works for arbitrary Event Source
